Test Name: Mycobacterium Tuberculosis Complex (MTBC) Molecular Detection PCR (Paraffin Tissue)
Purpose: To detect Mycobacterium Tuberculosis Complex DNA in paraffin-embedded tissue samples using PCR.
Container: Formalin-fixed paraffin tissue block or slide (section) placed in a labeled container/tube
Equipment: Thermal cycler, PCR workstation with UV decontamination, microcentrifuge, micropipettes, vortex mixer
